pages.name: Things I worked on

pages.info:
Ability to work smoothly across different cross teams having designers, business analysts, project managers etc.
Able to work across agile development methodologies
You can have my inputs across some key elements like app flow improvement, database handling, push notifications, web backend handling, code reviews etc. throughout the project.
Got an experience of working with different demographics like America, Russia, Australia, Asia, Singapore.
Over communication is never too bad and that’s what I believe in. In terms of communication you’ll find me closer than your spouse
Regularly update myself and clients on what’s new (Android 14.0 is out by the way!)

about_me:
"

Hello! I’m Amit and I’m a 5 year old mobile app developer.
Completed my graduation in Computer Science, I’m a Software Geek (engineer) by choice
.Trusted by individuals, agencies and Startups worldwide, I tend to offer powerful yet cost effective mobile app development services.

"
